company.name: McKinsey Digital Labs

title: Technology Specialist
desc: I was hired to work with MDL in SouthEast Asia. During this time I have helped to design and implement a substantial part of the clients' microservice based middleware layer. I also acted as tech lead for one of the development teams.

title: Software Architect
desc: I was hired as a software architect to advise on Infrastructure and Microservice topics, Mobile Application Development and to implement solutions for their international clients.

company.name: T-Labs
company.desc: T-Labs is an innovation laboratory which hires experts and creatives from countries all around the world.

title: DevOps Engineer
desc: In this role I was responsible for transitioning their infrastructure virtual machine centric to a container-based environment, enabling continuous deployment of Docker images onto the infrastructure.

company.name: T-Labs
company.desc: The mission of T-Labs is to develop innovative products and solutions while working in close cooperation with science and industry.

title: FullStack JavaScript Developer
desc: I architected, designed and implemented an offline-first prototype for a communications app product running on the desktop, tablet and mobile devices.

company.name: eHealth Africa
company.desc: eHealth Africa's goal is to provide solutions to public health interventions across West Africa.

title: FullStack JavaScript Developer
desc: I was called to create Microservices for global and local identifier handling which supported an Offline-First document storage system, used by agents out in the field.

company.name: Pebble {Code}
company.desc: Pebble {Code} is a technical innovation consultancy based in South London, UK catering to clients such as AstraZeneca and BedeGaming.

title: FullStack JavaScript Developer
desc: At Pebble, I implemented Node.js integrations with internal systems and developed various dashboards to gain better insights into their systems. I also developed a JavaScript framework that was used to author clients mobile game implementations.

company.name: Williams Lea Tag
company.desc: Williams Lea Tag is a global brand services agency based in London, UK.

title: Senior Front-end Developer
desc: The initial task was to support the UX team by converting mockups and wireframes into HTML prototypes. Later, I was responsible for the Front-End redesign and development of the main product (tag:cmd), converting the legacy code base into a state of the art application.

During my time at Tag, I was promoted to Front-End Team Lead where I coordinated and mentored team members and acquainted them with modern development practices such as Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration and Deployment.

company.name: Enoise
company.desc: Enoise is a WordPress hosting company based in London, UK.

title: Front-end Developer
desc: I was in charge of running in-house infrastructure that was used to support open-source PHP projects. I also built WordPress themes and plugins for clients.
